name: Operation P. T. B. (Protect the Boat)
name_original: Operation P. T. B. (Protect the Boat)
description:
Operation P. T. B. (Protect the Boat)

by CJDW (Sejedewe)

Game Description:

Somehow, you are the game itself (just imagine it please). Suddenly there is an uncontrollable boat with a person inside it. Unluckily, there is also a barrage of obstacles that the boat needs to avoid. You must use your powerful ability to steer these obstacles (visualized by the "magic pacman ball") to ensure the safety of the person that is on the boat.

Controls:

- Single-player

Mouse cursor => controls the "magic pacman ball"

- Multi-player (does not adhere to the game jam rules)

[Player 1] Mouse cursor => controls the "magic pacman ball"

[Player 2] A/left, D/right => steers the boat

Gameplay:

Don't let the obstacles collide with the boat! Use your "magic pacman ball" to protect the it!
